RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LELAWALA settled back early, rallied into the stretch, split rivals late , won driving. HOT TAKE dueled for the early lead, was game though second best. NATURAL IMMUNITY stalked the early leaders while three wide, mild bid. VERMONT HOLIDAY dueled for the early lead, tired late. MARIMBA ran evenly. MY BRIDGET VERDOT no threat. DIXIE'S DANCE gave way early.

ENTRY.NAME: Natural Immunity
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early duel, three wide, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Lelawala
ENTRY.COMMENT: back early, rallied, split rivals, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LATER DAYS stalked the early leader, moved when ready thru the lane, won driving. ICE FLOE went clear early, was no match for the winner late, second best. CROSSTOWN GIRL was midpack early, was game while earning show. TARA DAWN was back early, moved up around the turn, mild bid while saving ground. RUN AWAY FEVER was never a factor. MIZZEN up close early, gave way. EGG NOG trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Crosstown Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack early, game for the show

ENTRY.NAME: Later Days
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked the early leader, moved when ready, driving

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: The Revocable Trust of Dr. Mikel C.Harrington & Patricia O

ENTRY.NAME: Tara Dawn
ENTRY.COMMENT: back early, mild bid, needed more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEARTNESS vied outside rival for early lead, drew clear around the turn, proved best driving. SAG HARBOR settled up close early, rallied but was second best. TAPPIN ROYALTY back early, made a wide move and bested others. QIAN B C was wide throughout. EASY STRIDE trailed early, made a late wide bid. WILD RIVER WOLF contested the early lead and tired. GATTO MARRONE tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Sag Harbor
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled up close, rallied, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Tappin Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: back early, wide bid, bested others

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 14, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 14 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WITNESS THE ENERGY vied early, drew off thru the stretch, easily. ULTRA DIVA back early, rallied strongly for the place. GOT ANY vied for early lead, weakened late. S S ENERGY midpack early, no threat. WEST VIRGINIA PAM trailed throughout.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 2F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners At Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 To Carry An Additional 2 lbs. For Each Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZAINO BOYZ broke well,driving. SKYLAS GOLD broke sharp, led,just missed. CAN SHE SCOOT vied for early lead, weakened late. PERFECT GENTLEMAN crowed eighth pole. PROMINENT HENNY drifted outward. REGAL HOLIDAY broke outward. HE'S ON THE LINE drifted in,no factor. SHADOW SURPRISE crowded early.

ENTRY.NAME: He's On the Line
ENTRY.OWNER: Sperling Nancie S and Racanelli Mark Joseph

ENTRY.NAME: Regal Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Christopher L and Gray Melissa R

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 14 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races No t Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAAGY Moved up between horses on turn, took command, driving. DOCTOR WU was wide throughout, surged late to gain place. BANKX TURBO led early, dueled thru the stretch to just miss place. SPEIGHTY WAR was wide throughout. LIGHTNING JACK dropped back early. TURBINADO hopped at the start, rider lost irons.

ENTRY.NAME: Baagy
ENTRY.OWNER: Pesaturo Gus and Joy Kevin J

ENTRY.NAME: Bankx Turbo
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, battled gamely, just missed place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).

CLAIM.OWNER: Baird, John W. and Harbison, Rex

RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRIVISTA Trailed early, saved ground into the stretch, rallied strongly, driving. CAPE LOOKOUT contested lead throughout, very game, second best. HOBE SOUND settled behind leaders, steadied slightly midstretch, got show. BALTIC FLEET was wide throughout, tired late. LOW COUNTRY DUDE no factor. WITH SECRET ENERGY back early, no threat. KITCHI led early, gave way readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Cape Lookout
ENTRY.COMMENT: contested lead throughout, gamely, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Trivista
ENTRY.COMMENT: Trailed early, saved ground, flew late,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Hobe Sound
ENTRY.OWNER: Eastham Richard and Brown Ronney W

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 14, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eli gibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE SMART COOKIE reserved early, rallied strongly, driving. STRADARI vied for lead, caught late. PETAL contested pace, weakened late. CAPTAIN ANNE no factor. DONYA'S MAGIC stumbled badly at the start losing all chance. FLAT OUT APPEALING tired. NANCYSAIDSO outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Donya's Magic
ENTRY.OWNER: Staley Terry and Lugovich Charles F

ENTRY.NAME: Nancysaidso
ENTRY.OWNER: Devane William E and King Adam
